Projects.name: Break In Game
Projects.desc: Inspired by the classic game "Break-out". Break In is a game that takes a unique spin on the gameplay loop

Projects.name: Eyes On The Road Game
Projects.desc: "Eyes On The Road" is a simple 2D racing game set in the highway where you have to escape the demon from the tunnel thats following you with your driving skills. Made for a game jam.

Projects.name: PesanBuku app
Projects.desc: this is the backend of the PesanBuku app enableing users to buy books from a retailer with more ease and efficiency

Projects.name: Winter Vampire
Projects.desc: A game where you are a vampire who is a tad bit late to Halloween. and now has to find and hunt animals to stay alive whilst avoiding danger
